# Labs and friends

### The Plant Evolution and Biodiversity Group

My current lab at [Aarhus University](https://peb-group.net/). We work on questions about the diversity and evolution of plants, criss-crossing several fields including genomics, phylogenetics, macroevolution, comparative biology, biogeography, macroecology, community ecology, and taxonomy.

### The herpetology lab at Natural History Museum Berlin

My former [lab](https://www.researchgate.net/lab/Mark-Oliver-Roedel-Lab). Frog experts, snake enthusiasts and allround ecologists. <a href="https://www.naturkundemuseum.berlin/en/einblicke/mitarbeiter/melanie.tietje">

</a>
